entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Razor Source Generator question/follow-up regarding comment in .NET Conf session. #38238
    Discussions
  • VS2022 RC3 Blazor compiling files that have been excluded from the project #38234
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Serialize(Tuple.Create()) inconsistency between (debug/release) & published #38233
  • [Feature Request] SignalR response compression with new websockets compression in Asp.Net Core 6 #38230
  • After Updating to Visual Studio 2022 Current from Visual Studio 2022 Preview, Blazor project display error when debuggin #38229
  • Blazor UI not updated after field update in onclick #38228
  • Update .net 5 to 6: 'The path must be absolute' #38226
  • Startup regression: mvc #38224
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #38223
  • Perf improvement: mvc #38222
  • Port WebAssembly in .Net 6 RC2: The top level app must directly references to the assemblies used by it's referenced assemblies to 6.0.1xx #38220
    6.0.x
  • Upgrading app to .Net 6 Shows multiple app errors under browser console #38215
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.Extensions package dependent on prerelease package #38214
  • Unable to call StaticWebAssetsLoader.UseStaticWebAssets after upgrading to VS 2022 official release #38212
  • HttpResponseStreamWriter should override TextWriter.WriteLineAsync(string) #38210
  • Dashboard like Phoenix Liveview Dashboard for ASP.NET Core 7 #38207
  • RemoteJSRuntime uses SignalR global options instead of ComponentHub options #38205
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ASP.Net 6 Namespace issue #38204
  • Blazor Hot Reload only Works with dotnet watch, not from Visual Studio 2022 #38202
  • The group can be removed if there is none in the group in signalr? #38200
  • Startup improvement: https #38199
  • Startup regression: plaintext #38198
  • EPIC: SignalR - .NET7 #38196
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Default Blazor Wasm template does not run #38195
  • NullReferenceException coming from Razor compiler after upgrade of .NET SDK (without any change to .NET 5 project). #38194
    6.0.x

Closed

  • MSB6004 The specified task executable location "%ProgramFiles%\dotnet\dotnet.exe" is invalid on a brand new Blazor project #38232
  • Error when trying to use Quic with current .NET 6 RC #37971
  • Make JSInterop (@microsoft/dotnet-js-interop) UMD-compatible #38208
  • Choosing AOT in Blazor.Wasm Doesn't produce Webassembly files -->Click here to see details #38191
  • runtime cannot find System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs #38227
  • BUG: <PageTitle> not works in WasmPrerender mode #38192
  • Startup improvement: connectionclose #38152
  • Blazor supporting an IEnumerable of RenderFragment as children #38206
  • navigator.clipboard.writeText blocked in Safari (MacOS and iOS) #38211
  • Virtualize component - Adding Span<T> support #38216
  • WebAssembly in .Net 6 RC2: The top level app must directly references to the assemblies used by it's referenced assemblies #37574
    7.0-preview1
  • Error in documentation #38201
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation 3.2.21 has broken dependencies on NuGet #38172
  • Vs2022 official version 17.0.0 asp.net core 6 MVC, unable to jump to the controller in the view #38197
  • Startup improvement: connectionclosehttps #37962
  • Startup improvement: mvc #38106
  • Hi @jojorgeluisrdz198. It looks like you just commented on a closed PR. The team will most probably miss it. If you'd like to bring something important up to their attention, consider filing a new issue and add enough details to build context. #38193
  • fail `dotnet watch run` CS0246 The type or namespace name 'App' could not be found #36985
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Update to latest #38231
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #38218
    5.0.x
  • Enable TrackLinkedCacheEntries for cache tag helpers #38190
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1

Merged

  • [release/3.1] Update SDK and baseline #38184
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.22
  • Update RazorPage template to be able to be SxS with previous version #34598
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/5.0] Update to latest #38225
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.13
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #38219
    3.1.22

Updated

  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr, api-suggestion
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3b49be0` to `16f637f` #37981
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    api-suggestion, community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Improve exception messages referencing startup code #38093
    Servicing-approved, area-security, 6.0.1
  • Create ReleasePlanning.md #37940
    Docs, area-infrastructure
  • Consolidate test projects for helix #38183
    area-infrastructure
